td.content: s:F retired aged 67 Ys presents w/ c/o 5 weeks h/o severe fever, severe fatigue and Respiratory. Patient does not smoke she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 66 in, Weight 112 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 18, CT Chest Cavity or Centrilobular Lesions of the Lung, mild rhonchi, HEENT: WNL, wheeze-BIL a:Tuberculosis p:administered Ethambutol - 400 mg oral, Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Pyrazinamide - 15 mg/kg oral, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, performed CT Chest, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
